original_text: And he sent them to Bethlehem, saying, “Go and search diligently for the child, and when you have found him, bring me word, that I too may come and worship him.”
korean_text: 베들레헴으로 보내며 이르되 가서 아기에 대하여 자세히 알아보고 찾거든 내게 고하여 나도 가서 그에게 경배하게 하라

sentences.original_text: And he sent them to Bethlehem, saying,
Go and search diligently for the child,
and when you have found him,
that I too may come and worship him.”
sentences.korean_translation: 나도 가서 그를 경배하게 하려 함이라.”
